name: The HORDES (hugebeverDEV)
description:
THE HORDES

the hordes is a pre-Alpha of a game that will be realesed on steam. it is being developed by a company based in Norway (Lazy code Studios).

Upon the full realese this game will be removed from itch, so download now!

the game will come out this year (2022) and will include a story mode and minigames.
